sentences.en: Cuttlebone can be used as a medicine to stanch bleeding.
sentences.cn: 海螵蛸可以入药,用来止血.

sentences.en: Designed with spiral slide to stanch bleeding, can slightly adjust the compression pressure.
sentences.cn: 压迫止血采用螺旋滑块设计, 可微调压迫压力.

sentences.en: I thought it my duty to help stanch these leaks.
sentences.cn: 我认为帮助堵塞漏洞是我的职责.

sentences.en: Try, for a moment, to stanch the flow of desire.
sentences.cn: 你可以尝试着在一段时期内止住你的欲望之流。

trans.tran_cn: 使止血, 止, 止流, 止血
trans.tran_en: to stem the flow of (a liquid, esp blood) or (of a liquid) to stop flowing

trans.tran_cn: 使（伤口）止血，止（血），使不漏，使不流失
